data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Chuvash, Russia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chuvash, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,301,200 people living in Chuvash through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Chuvash, Russia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Chuvash, Russia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Akkin people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Akkin people know you.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 730,340 cultural Christians in the state of Chuvash to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Chuvash, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chuvash, Russia has a population of 1,301,200.

We estimate Chuvash has 19,042 people who might know Jesus, 730,340 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 551,817 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Chuvash to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

location.name: Chuvash
